Title: Requires all police vehicles to be equipped with bulletproof or bullet resistant glass
Summary: Requires all police vehicles to be equipped with bulletproof or bullet resistant glass on and after January 1, 2025; requires existing police cars to be retrofitted with bulletproof or bullet resistant glass.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to bulletproof glass on police vehicles
